item.title: Static Site Frameworks: Hugo, Jekyll or Gatsby?
item.description: Bloggin' ðŸ˜Ž Categories Ease of Creation Theming Hosting Updates Hugo Hugo was my first attempt of the list of static sites. This was due to it claiming to be fast and easy to work with, (with Jekyll being a close second - or even an easier platform). Setup The initial setup of Hugo is simple. Install Hugo: brew install hugo Create a new site: hugo new site hugo-test Move to the site’s directory: cd hugo-test Run the site locally with drafts enabled: hugo server -D Now we have a Hugo site up and running!
